name: elevenlabs
description: A server that integrates with ElevenLabs text-to-speech API capable of generating full voiceovers with multiple voices.

tools.name: generate_audio_simple
tools.description: Generate audio from plain text using default voice settings

text.description: Plain text to convert to audio

voice_id.description: Optional voice ID to use for generation

tools.name: generate_audio_script

script.description: JSON string containing script array or plain text. For JSON format, provide an object with a 'script' array containing objects with 'text' (required), 'voice_id' (optional), and 'actor' (optional) fields.

tools.name: delete_job
tools.description: Delete a voiceover job and its associated files

job_id.description: ID of the job to delete

tools.name: get_audio_file
tools.description: Get the audio file content for a specific job

job_id.description: ID of the job to get audio file for

tools.name: list_voices
tools.description: Get a list of all available ElevenLabs voices with metadata

tools.name: get_voiceover_history
tools.description: Get voiceover job history. Optionally specify a job ID for a specific job.

job_id.description: Optional job ID to get details for a specific job

ELEVENLABS_API_KEY.description: Your API key for ElevenLabs to access the text-to-speech services.
ELEVENLABS_API_KEY.title: ELEVENLABS_API_KEY

ELEVENLABS_VOICE_ID.description: The ID of the voice you want to use for synthesis.
ELEVENLABS_VOICE_ID.title: ELEVENLABS_VOICE_ID

ELEVENLABS_MODEL_ID.description: The model ID to be used, indicating the version of the ElevenLabs API to utilize.
ELEVENLABS_MODEL_ID.title: ELEVENLABS_MODEL_ID

ELEVENLABS_STABILITY.description: Stability of the voice generation; controls variations in the output voice.
ELEVENLABS_STABILITY.title: ELEVENLABS_STABILITY

ELEVENLABS_SIMILARITY_BOOST.description: Boosting similarity for the voices; affects how closely the output mimics the selected voice.
ELEVENLABS_SIMILARITY_BOOST.title: ELEVENLABS_SIMILARITY_BOOST

ELEVENLABS_STYLE.description: Style parameter to adjust the expression in the generated speech.
ELEVENLABS_STYLE.title: ELEVENLABS_STYLE

ELEVENLABS_OUTPUT_DIR.description: Directory path where the generated audio files will be saved.
ELEVENLABS_OUTPUT_DIR.title: ELEVENLABS_OUTPUT_DIR
